data.title: Back It Up Lyrics by B2k
data.meta_description: Back It Up Lyrics, B2k, do do do do do do do doo, oh yea  do
data.text:
Clean Lyric

Paragraph Lyric

do do do do do do do doo, oh yea

do do do do do do do doo, check it out, what b2k

do do do do do do do doo, once again, platinum status

uh, pandemonium, do do do do do do do doo

ooohh, talk to 'em O

it's one o'clock in the morning, we in the 745 just rolling

i see some OK chicks over my shoulder

they wanna know, they wanna know (oooh)

what we doing and where we going

yall keep questioning but yall not knowing

we not feeling yall so keep moving

we don't wanna roll, no where with yall (ooohh)

[chorus]

girl you need to be up on me, back it up (back it up, back it up)

don't leave me here standing lonely, back it up (back it up, back it up)

i'm just trying to get my groove on, back it up (back it up, back it up)

cuz we ain't playing, and i ain't playing so baby girl let's do the thing

now we dancing everybody moving

all the chicks in here shaking their booties

throwing it up the fellas they saying ooohhwee

think this girl know, i'm losing control

how she shaking it got me tripping

i know i got this one i'm never slipping

the way she looking i know she with it

so grab your coat and baby let's go (ooohh)

[chorus]

shorty, what whats the deal? all up on me gurl you need to chill

out of control like a car with 3 wheels

i can't be with you, i can't pay your bills

what you doing now you need to do lessa

i thought i told you 3 feet no pressure

yall getting no where with your hand gestures

ya not finding a dude like me so God bless ya

[chorus 2x]

do do do do do do do doo, get up on me, right now, back it up

do do do do do do do doo, tell me you want it baby, yea

do do do do do do do doo, do do do

do do do do do do do doo, do do do

do do do do do do do doo

do do do do do do do doo, oh yea do do do do do do do doo, check it out, what b2k do do do do do do do doo, once again, platinum status uh, pandemonium, do do do do do do do doo ooohh, talk to 'em O it's one o'clock in the morning, we in the 745 just rolling i see some OK chicks over my shoulder they wanna know, they wanna know (oooh) what we doing and where we going yall keep questioning but yall not knowing we not feeling yall so keep moving we don't wanna roll, no where with yall (ooohh) [chorus] girl you need to be up on me, back it up (back it up, back it up) don't leave me here standing lonely, back it up (back it up, back it up) i'm just trying to get my groove on, back it up (back it up, back it up) cuz we ain't playing, and i ain't playing so baby girl let's do the thing now we dancing everybody moving all the chicks in here shaking their booties throwing it up the fellas they saying ooohhwee think this girl know, i'm losing control how she shaking it got me tripping i know i got this one i'm never slipping the way she looking i know she with it so grab your coat and baby let's go (ooohh) [chorus] shorty, what whats the deal? all up on me gurl you need to chill out of control like a car with 3 wheels i can't be with you, i can't pay your bills what you doing now you need to do lessa i thought i told you 3 feet no pressure yall getting no where with your hand gestures ya not finding a dude like me so God bless ya [chorus 2x] do do do do do do do doo, get up on me, right now, back it up do do do do do do do doo, tell me you want it baby, yea do do do do do do do doo, do do do do do do do do do do doo, do do do do do do do do do do doo
